title: ICE with incremental build of servo with incremental compilation

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

milestone.title: Incremental compilation beta
milestone.description: Reach a point where we offer people incremental compilation on stable and encourage them to use it. The idea is to have some minimal set of performance goals and good correctness testing.

body:
CC @nikomatsakis 

Rev 75418b70054664634f8f69e636f84e7e4e2731ed

error: internal compiler error: ../src/librustc/ty/mod.rs:2346: could not load def-path for DefId { krate: CrateNum(12), node: DefIndex(1) }

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
